body:
Is it just +jailbait or are there more? I want to make a post concurrent with the list of banned Reddit subs on +reclassified to keep track.

I request that the admins have the list of banned users and guilds be publicly available.
body_html:
Is it just +jailbait or are there more? I want to make a post concurrent with the list of banned Reddit subs on +reclassified to keep track.

I request that the admins have the list of banned users and guilds be publicly available.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

author.bio: libertarian | ancap | weeb | programmer | pagan larp

body: /+loli is banned. Now I don't know how you feel about lolis on a moral level, but at the end of the day, they are just fictional drawings. That being said, I can forgive that one being banned since I know hosting companies and domain registrars can get pretty ass blasted about lolis, even if they aren't illegal.
body_html: /+loli is banned. Now I don't know how you feel about lolis on a moral level, but at the end of the day, they are just fictional drawings. That being said, I can forgive that one being banned since I know hosting companies and domain registrars can get pretty ass blasted about lolis, even if they aren't illegal.

body: Yeah that one I completely understand banning, while technically not illegal it could be a pain in the ass to have to deal with with the hosts. It’s just better to simply not allow it, it’s questionable anyways.
